description:
## 2024-06-19 `1.30.1`

#### üêõ Bug fixes

- Added a div to position the icon of the `Toast`component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

## 2024-06-19 `1.1.2`

#### üêõ Bug fixes

- Added the size prop for the `container` class of the `Input.Password` and `Input.Search`. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

## 2024-06-19 `1.0.3`

#### üêõ Bug fixes

- Removed index of the content of `Toast.provider` component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))
- Fixed placement of the icon of `Toast` component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))
- Fixed font size and line height of the title of `Toast` component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))
- Fixed appearance of close icon button for the neutral appearance of `Toast` component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))

## 2024-06-12 `1.29.1`

#### üêõ Bug fixes

- Fixed the hover state for `IconButton` component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))
- Fixed border radius for ghost and tonal variants for `IconButton` component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))
- Fixed padding and spacing for `Toast` component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))
- Added iconContainer style for the icon of the `Toast` component. ([#60](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/frontend/rarui/-/merge_requests/60) by [@vinicius.osmainchi](https://git.rarolabs.com.br/vinicius.osmainchi))
